SEARCH
Package com.tarjanyicsanad.domain.repository

Interface AuthorRepository

All Known Implementing Classes:
DatabaseAuthorRepository, InMemoryAuthorRepository, JpaAuthorRepository
public interface AuthorRepository
A repository for managing Authors.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addAuthor(Author author)
    Adds the given author to the repository.
    List<Author>
    findAllAuthors()
    Returns a list of all authors.
    Optional<AuthorEntity>
    findAuthorByName(String firstName, String lastName)
    Finds an author entity by the given first name and last name.
    AuthorEntity
    findOrCreateEntity(Author author)
    Finds an existing author entity by the given author details or creates a new one if not found.
    Optional<Author>
    getAuthor(int id)
    Returns an author with the given id.
    void
    removeAuthor(int id)
    Removes the author with the given id.
    void
    updateAuthor(Author author)
    Updates the author with the same id as the given author.

  • Method Details

    • addAuthor

      void addAuthor(Author author)
      Adds the given author to the repository.
      Parameters:
      author - the author to add

    • removeAuthor

      void removeAuthor(int id) throws AuthorNotFoundException
      Removes the author with the given id.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the author to remove
      Throws:
      AuthorNotFoundException - if no author with the given id is found

    • getAuthor

      Optional<Author> getAuthor(int id)
      Returns an author with the given id.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the author to find
      Returns:
      an empty optional if no author with the given id is found

    • findOrCreateEntity

      AuthorEntity findOrCreateEntity(Author author)
      Finds an existing author entity by the given author details or creates a new one if not found.
      Parameters:
      author - the author details to find or create
      Returns:
      the found or newly created AuthorEntity

    • findAuthorByName

      Optional<AuthorEntity> findAuthorByName(String firstName, String lastName)
      Finds an author entity by the given first name and last name.
      Parameters:
      firstName - the first name of the author
      lastName - the last name of the author
      Returns:
      an optional containing the found AuthorEntity, or empty if not found

    • findAllAuthors

      List<Author> findAllAuthors()
      Returns a list of all authors. The list is unmodifiable, meaning that changes to it will not be reflected in the data.
      Returns:
      a list of all authors

    • updateAuthor

      void updateAuthor(Author author) throws AuthorNotFoundException
      Updates the author with the same id as the given author.
      Parameters:
      author - the author to update
      Throws:
      AuthorNotFoundException - if no author with the same id is found
